summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of West 65th Street, from 32nd Avenue Northwest to 7th Avenue Northwest; 7th Avenue Northwest, from West 65th Street to West 70th Street; West 70th Street and North 70th Street, from 7th Avenue Northwest to Greenwood Avenue; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6102 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
